author: timbeiko
content:
Sepolia Post-Merge Upgrade Announcement ðŸ“£ 

In order to disconnect non-upgraded peers, the Sepolia testnet must run through a simple network upgrade. This is scheduled for August 17, 2022. If you run a Sepolia node, you must update your EL before then. More info in this post: https://blog.ethereum.org/2022/08/03/sepolia-post-merge-upgrade/
